alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 4:27PM CDT until April 12 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JUNEAU AND NORTHERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Babcock, or 12 miles southwest of Wisconsin Rapids, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public reported penny sized hail north of Warrens at 410 pm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... New Rome around 435 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include New Miner, Lake Arrowhead, Mather, County Roads G And O, The Sprague Mather Flowage, County Roads O And W and County Roads D And G. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
